name: BzzzController
description:
BzzzController allows you to turn on vibration on your gamepad. Your controller keeps vibrating even when you move the window into background or when you minimize it. You can use sliders to change intensity of the vibration. You can also choose between 3 modes – always on, intensity sinus function and on/off. BzzzController can be used for up to 4 gamepads.
BzzzController was tested with an Xbox One controller.
Requires Windows 10, does not work on Windows 7.
